attributes.action: Put the tuition fees for university back to what they were before they went up in 2006
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tuition fees to be put back to 2005's prices instead of £3070. They are too much at the moment

rejection.details: There is a related petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/topupfees/ You may wish to sign this rather than open a new one.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
